subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Panama’s slim hopes of reaching the World Cup received a boost when Jurgen Klinsmann, the United States coach, said he would sit out Landon Donovan
snippet: Panama’s slim hopes of reaching the World Cup received a boost when Jurgen Klinsmann, the United States coach, said he would sit out Landon Donovan
